title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repo: CLI and Go library for pulling, running, and managing quantized LLMs locally.

title: langchain-ai/langchain
summary: Python/JS library with first-class Ollama LLM and embeddings integrations for building RAG & agent workflows.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official lightweight Python client (PyPI: ollama) for chatting, pulling, listing, and deleting local models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official TypeScript/JavaScript client (npm: ollama) that works in Node, Deno, and browsers via the Ollama REST API.

title: jmorganca/ollama-ui
summary: Minimal web chat UI that connects to a local Ollama instance for browser-based conversations.

title: ollama-webui/ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured open-source WebUI (formerly Ollama-WebUI) with chat history, model switching, and RAG file uploads.

title: richawo/ollama-rag
summary: Streamlit app providing a point-and-click RAG pipeline using Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector store.

title: ollama/ollama-hub
summary: Community-curated list of model repos, tools, and integrations compatible with Ollama.

title: kevinwatt/ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that forwards user prompts to a local Ollama instance and streams replies into a channel.

title: ollama4j/ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client SDK (Maven Central) wrapping the Ollama REST API with POJO models and streaming.

title: ollama/ollama-ruby
summary: Official Ruby gem for interacting with Ollama’s REST API, supporting generate, chat, pull, and embed endpoints.

title: ollama/ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol (MCP) server exposing Ollama models as tools for Claude Desktop and other MCP consumers.

title: ollama/ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and persistent storage.

title: ollama/ollama-distro
summary: Build scripts and specs for community packages (AUR, Homebrew, Chocolatey, Nix) maintained by Ollama team.

title: ollama/ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET client (NuGet: OllamaSharp) with async/await and streaming for C# apps.
